definition: to be infatuated with/to be drunk with/to be enchanted with/to revel in
lit. to fire pots and smelt metal/fig. to educate
to cultivate one's mind/to build character
a pottery figurine buried with the dead
Tao Yuanming (c. 365-427), Jin dynasty writer and poet
Terence Tao, Chinese-Australian mathematician, Fields medalist in 2006
Tao Xingzhi (1891-1946), Chinese educator and reformer

sentences.english: When he woke up, Tao went to tell Zhang about his dream.
sentences.chinese: 當他醒後，陶告訴張他做的夢。

sentences.english: The one-time ejaculate volume of Poll Dorset ram, sperm density and sperm motility rate increased by 0.
sentences.chinese: 與對照組相比，可提高無角陶賽特公羊一次射精量0。

sentences.english: Mr. Tao here has to learn his lesson.
sentences.chinese: 陶先生顯然還需要得到這個教訓。

sentences.english: Pottery utensils for daily use were chiefly made from refined terracotta and red sandy clay.
sentences.chinese: 日用陶器以細泥紅陶和夾砂紅褐陶爲主。

sentences.english: "Careful not to cut yourselves, " Tao shouted out cheerily.
sentences.chinese: “小心不要被割傷，”導遊陶樂呵呵地提醒道。

sentences.english: The Devastators is a powerful addition to General Tao's army.
sentences.chinese: 破壞者坦克素一支加入陶將軍部隊的強力單位。

sentences.english: Wall brick is told strictly should belong to fictile , floor tile is porcelain goods normally.
sentences.chinese: 牆磚嚴格講應屬於陶製品，地磚則通常是瓷製品。

sentences.english: Taiwanese artist has discovered a way to turn wasted natural materials into beautiful pottery.
sentences.chinese: 一位臺灣藝術家將廢棄天然素材，做成美麗的陶製品。

sentences.english: Otto's book is characterized by the greatest emphasis on the history of the process and details.
sentences.chinese: 陶先生的著作最大的特點就是注重歷史的過程和細節。

sentences.english: As an artist, Tao Dongdong has many ideals.
sentences.chinese: 作爲藝術家，陶鼕鼕有理想。

sentences.english: In the aquarium fish bowl and ceramic made of wood.
sentences.chinese: 養魚用的魚缸有木盆和陶瓦盆。

sentences.english: It is a city called Rottenburg ob der Tauber.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個叫做陶伯河上游羅滕堡的城市。

sentences.english: He is now talking with Mr. Tao, the head of Insurance Department of the Company.
sentences.chinese: 他現在與該公司的保險科科長陶先生談話。

sentences.english: Earthenware culture is of culture , source of art.
sentences.chinese: 陶文化又是文化之根，藝術之源。

sentences.english: Mr. Tao, I'd like to talk the insurance covering the consignment with you.
sentences.chinese: 陶先生，我想與你談談這批船貨的保險問題。

definition: surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
